titles.title: Community Services Block Grant Refinement and Improvement Act
Community Services Block Grant Refinement and Improvement Act
A bill to amend the Community Services Block Grant Act to clarify that the maximum allotment provision does not apply to supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 2020.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Community Services Block Grant Refinement and Improvement Act
This bill exempts certain funds appropriated for the Community Services Block Grant program from reductions that would otherwise apply under current law.
